#Get-SPOHealthScore
*Topic automatically generated on: 2015-10-02*

Retrieves the current health score value of the server
##Syntax
##Parameters
Parameter|Type|Required|Description
---------|----|--------|-----------
##Examples

###Example 1
```powershell
PS:> Get-SPOHealthScore
```
